page.title: 05Alstonefield Entertainment
page.content:
At home the entertainment is quite good. I usually entertain myself by watching television, working on the farm, playing cards or riding my bike.
There are not a lot of leisure activities outside the home. There is just the pub, but they are meant to be building a BMX track in the old school yard. They are starting a Youth Club in the school which is closed down.
Country and Westerns are usually held once a month in the old tin village hall which has a lot of facilities, like a stage and toilets. There are groups and solos which reach quite a high standard. There is also a bar which sells bar snacks and drinks. Most of the villagers come and they have a really good time.
